title: Empowerment of youth, vision of PM Imran Khan: Firdous
content:
SIALKOT, Feb 12 (APP):Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Information and Broadcasting Dr Firdous Ashiq Awan said on Wednesday that empowerment of the youth of the nation was vision of Prime Minister Imran Khan.
Addressing a cheque distribution ceremony to the youth under Kamyab Naujawan Programme event, she said that the government was taking steps to provide technical training to the new generation.
She said that the foundation of digital Pakistan has been laid and the youth would benefit from this development.
On the occasion, President Arif Alvi distributed cheques among the youth who were given loans under the Kamyab Naujawan Programme.
Special Assistant to the PM on Youth Affairs Usman Dar was also present on the occasion.
